description:
Citizens and soldiers alike prepare for all-out war as Ace is led to the site of his execution. While the world watches, the true identity of the condemned man`s father is shockingly revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen no Toki Semaru! Kaigun Saikyou no Fujin Kansei!
L`heure de la bataille décisive approche ! La plus puissante armée de la Marine !
Ticking Down to the Time of Battle! The Navy`s Strongest Lineup in Position!
Tutti pronti per la battaglia decisiva
Близится решающий бой! Сильнейшие силы Дозора в сборе!
決戦の刻迫る! 海軍最強の布陣完成!
